DQNAgent module¶

class DQNAgent.DQNAgent(id: int, obs_space: int, acs_space: int, configs: dict)¶

Bases: shiva.agents.Agent.Agent

instantiate_network() → None¶

Creates the crtic network the DQNAgent will use for inference or evaluation.

Uses the network section of the config along with acs_space and obs_space to create the network. Also creates the target network.

Returns

None

get_action(obs, step_n=0, evaluate=False)¶

This method iterates over all the possible actions to find the one with the highest Q value

Input

network policy network to be used observation observation from the environment

reset_noise() → None¶

Resets the Agent’s OU Noise

This is super important otherwise the noise will compound.

Returns

None

decay_value(start, decay_end_step, current_step_count, degree=1) → float¶

Decays a value from an initial to final value.

Can be linear, or polynomial.

Returns

A new float value.

is_e_greedy(step_count=None) → bool¶

Checks if an action should be random or inference.

Parameters

step_count (int) – Episodic counter that controls the epsilon.

Returns

Boolean indicating whether or not to take a random action.

Checks if an action should be random or inference.

Returns

Boolean indicating whether or not to add noise to an action.
